entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: S 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
